headline: Will Norwegian Cruise Line’s (NCLH) Leadership Shift Influence Management Credibility and Long-Term Strategy?
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. recently announced that David Herrera, former President of Norwegian Cruise Line, departed the company on August 20, 2025, as part of a leadership transition, with CEO Harry Sommer temporarily taking on his responsibilities while a successor is sought. While the leadership change introduces some uncertainty, the company's decision to reaffirm its 2025 earnings guidance highlights management's continued confidence in its current business outlook. We'll...
